name: Bible Quest RPG *Demo
description:
I am very excited to release the demo of the intro level! Please note, the main character sprite has changed from the original screen shots, but the character sprite could change in the future as well.

Bible Quest takes place a 1000 years in the future.  A great war nearly annihilated Earth along with Christianity and all religion.  Small pockets of humans and humanoid species remain.  Only a handful of Bibles have survived and are hidden in the land by a few believers.  The Empire has outlawed all religion and provides the people with everything.  With the people completely reliant on the Empire, there is one thing the Empire cannot provide its people.  Salvation.  

If you are interested in donating to the project, please go to https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/bible-quest-rpg/x/20280547.

Thanks!
